rows.label: tev052701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Trigo about Team Slovity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Trigo about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Trigo about the battle with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ganglion's orders were absolute. Kill friends?
Kill family? Kill innocents? Always obey.
Otherwise you would be killed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0002
rows.name: This is why Ganglion soldiers do such horrible things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0003
rows.name:
But Team Slovity was different. We refused orders.
We were unafraid of punishment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0004
rows.name: For this, Ganglion called us "Infidels."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0005
rows.name:
I was proud to serve Slovity, even though we betrayed
Cavern Clan. I regret nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0008
rows.name: Team Slovity is whole again. Thanks to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0009
rows.name:
Now that comrades have returned,
we can strike back against Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0010
rows.name:
And not because we are ordered to. This is our fight!
For our pride![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0011
rows.name:
But we need your aid, Earth alien.
You have proven to be very strong ally.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0022
rows.name: After serving Ganglion, we know how horrible they are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0023
rows.name:
Their commanders were worst of all.
Goetia... Ryyz... Dagahn...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0024
rows.name: And Luxaar's power exceeded entire division![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0025
rows.name:
Yet your team destroyed all of them. So surprising.
It grabs deep place in heart and shakes it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0026
rows.name: Team Slovity must train harder to equal you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Trigo about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0012
rows.name:
Team Slovity lost many during recent events.
We are weakened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0013
rows.name: But we share common enemy. We should join forces![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0014
rows.name: You are our only friend in city. We need your aid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Trigo about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0015
rows.name:
Captain Slovity trains us from dusk to dawn.
She vows to make us stronger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0016
rows.name: You put this fire in her. It speaks well of you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0017
rows.name:
You must be her good friend. Do this for me.
She is happier when you are near.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0018
rows.name: We travel around Mira. Put end to Ganglion stragglers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0019
rows.name:
Other aliens have started sharing supplies.
On good day, BLADE fights at our side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0020
rows.name:
Maybe coming to Earth-alien city was good decision.
I did not always believe it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG0021
rows.name:
From now on, I help Slovity defend city.
Prove that Cavern Clan have place here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_SEL4021
rows.name: Ask Trigo if she's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev052701_MSG4001
rows.name:
Sylvalum Cavern Clan tortured BLADEs.
Tore them apart while they still lived.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG4002
rows.name: Fallen BLADEs were called Adelbert and Grette.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG4003
rows.name:
These Prone are cruel. Cowardly. I feel agony with you.
I will not forget what they have done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052701_MSG4004
rows.name:
But dead cannot be brought back.
If your people have hate for Prone, I will accept it.[ST:wait ]
